body.name: Aveeno Calm + Restore Nourishing Oat Face Cleanser for Sensitive Skin, Gentle Milky Cleanser with Nourishing Oat & Feverfew, to Preserve Skin's Moisture Barrier, Fragrance-Free, 7.8 fl. oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 21 hrs 21 mins
features: 7.8-fluid ounces of Aveeno Calm + Restore Nourishing Oat Facial Cleanser for sensitive and irritated, dry skin to cleanse and purify while helping preserve skin's moisture barrie

Refreshing milky gel face wash gentle lifts away dirt, oil, makeup and impurities with the lightness of a gel and efficacy of a makeup remover, leaving sensitive skin looking healthy, cleansed, hydrated, soft and smooth
Gentle daily cleanser is formulated with a blend of nourishing oat and calming feverfew, which helps calm irritated, dry skin while strengthening skin's moisture barrier for long-term resilience

Ideal for sensitive skincare, it is hypoallergenic, fragrance-free, paraben-free, sulfate-free, alcohol-free, dye-free, phthalate-free, tested on sensitive skin and non-comedogenic, so it won't clog pores as it cleanses
Suitable for daily use in a regular skincare routine, the hydrating facial cleanser comes from Aveeno, a dermatologist recommended brand
body.description: Aveeno Calm + Restore Nourishing Oat Facial Cleanser with nourishing oat and calming feverfew for sensitive skin gently cleanses and hydrates skin. Ideal for irritated, dry, sensitive skin, this milky cleanser lifts away dirt and impurities, leaving skin looking healthy and feeling hydrated. Aveeno Calm + Restore suitable for sensitive skin with nourishing oat goes beyond soothing and restores skin's moisture barrier. The non-comedogenic formula of this gentle face cleanser has been tested on sensitive skin and is free of fragrances, parabens, alcohol, dyes, and phthalates to instantly leave skin feeling cleansed and soothed. From a dermatologist-recommended brand for over 70 years, Aveeno Calm + Restore comes in a bottle made with at least 30% Post-Consumer Recycled plastic. Use morning and night as part of your daily skincare routine by massaging 1-2 pumps on to wet skin in a circular motion. Rinse and pat dry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This product works amazing. I’ve only been using it for 2 days and it’s already made my dry skin hydrated. I love how it doesn’t have a smell and I love how the texture is (like water but heavier). I can’t say this enough… it’s worth your money!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: Loved it, would buy again, no harmful ingredients or perfumes, my face did not react at all, also very moisturizing, would buy again but the bigger version.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Although I've seen these in the store. I decided to buy it here and try it. I have to say that I absolutely love it so far. I love Aveeno products anyway so took a chance on this. It came with 2 bottles. The texture of the cleanser is absolutely fabulous so I take my time washing my face in a circular motion just to feel it. I follow it with Aveeno facial scrub which also is really nice. They both make my face feel very smooth. My night time regimen is completed with snail face and eye cream. Dang, the next day my face feels like a newborn baby. I used to use Aveeno Blackberry cleanser but very unfortunately it has been discontinued other than on Amazon but sellers overprice it big time. These new cleaners I use now by Aveeno definitely make up for the blackberry cleanser loss. I highly recommend the 2 mentioned above👌.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Everyday Gentle Cleanser
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using this cleanser for just over two weeks. So far I really like it. It cleanses gently without stripping the skin, and I like that it’s fragrance free and doesn’t contain niacinamide.The only downside is that it seems I have to use a lot or wash my face twice for my skin to feel clean enough. I’ve also noticed that if I don’t double cleanser everyday, that my skin feels more congested. I do have oily skin though so perhaps that’s why.Overall I think that for the price this cleanser is a good option. You may just need to use more/buy it more frequently if you have oily, acne prone skin like mine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for dry and sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: Is great for a daily facial cleanser that won't dry your skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: i was scared when it didn’t foam up like regular soap but omg my skin is so soft and smooth and looks so pretty!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s a gel
reviews.reviewText: It doesn’t foam up so it doesn’t really feel like it’s cleaning your face. But it’s super gentle didn’t make my face break out and my skin is pretty sensitive. Kinda smells like bananas

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very gentle for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: Love the whole line. Very gentle for use especially now I’m trying to fix my skin barrier. I use it mainly in the morning and love the oat smell too.

reviews.reviewTitle: Color is brown not as shown in display

reviews.reviewText: I look forward to washing my face with this cleanser daily. It feels really good to massage it all over my face. It is for light basic cleansing and it won’t remove stubborn makeup. I double cleanse with this to remove sunscreen and grime at end of the day. It doesn’t sting or burn. Very very nice product. My skin does feel calm after washing with it. I love that it is fragrance free and mild smelling.

reviews.reviewTitle: I like the fast and efficient service provided by Amazon.sg
reviews.reviewText: The product is good and it gives a fresh and smooth feeling.

reviews.reviewTitle: Product leaked out during the shipping process.
reviews.reviewText: The product is great for my skin. The only complain I have is that it leaked out during the shipping. Other similar products in the package was fine thanks to a tape over the top of the dispenser pump.

The product is very suitable for sensitive skin. My skin is very sensitive and it often itch and redden, however, after using the product, my skin does not itch anymore and it’s within one week of usage. I highly recommend this product. Hope the brand doesn’t change their formula!
